Room.Name: Glabor Gulley Northern Path
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the northern path of Glabor Gulley, near a large cave.
Room.LongDescription: There are several smaller caves to the east and the west, but this one appears to be a community cave rather than one of the residences. Trolls have been known to enjoy a drink or two, so perhaps this is a gathering place for those desiring some of the good Uland rum made by the dwarves.
